Class PowerUpDenPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • PowerUpDenPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, Refreshable

    public class PowerUpDenPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements Refreshable
    Instances of PowerUpDenPanel are components of Game objects. They contain all components related to the in-game power up den, and are displayed when the player enters the power up den.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void addContentPanel()
      Adds the content panel to the PowerUpDenPanel.
      private void addSelectHeroPanel()
      Adds a panel showing each hero on the team, with a radio button allowing the user to select that hero.
      private void addSelectPowerUpPanel()
      Adds a panel showing each power up and the number of that power up owned by the team.
      private void addSidePanel()
      Adds the side panel and all its components to the PowerUpDenPanel.
      private void addTitle()
      Adds the power up den title label.
      void refresh()
      Refreshes this panel by updating dynamic components.
      private void refreshApplyButton()
      Enables the Apply button if there is a hero and a power up selected, otherwise disables it.
      private void refreshContentPanel()
      Removes all components from the content panel, and adds them again.
      private Team team()
      Helper method to return the team of the current GameEnvironment.

        A ButtonGroup holding the radio buttons for each power up.

      • btnApply

        private javax.swing.JButton btnApply
        A button which applies the selected power up to the selected hero when pressed. Only enabled if there is a power up and a hero selected.

        Refreshes this panel by updating dynamic components.
        Specified by:

        private Team team()
        Helper method to return the team of the current GameEnvironment.
        Returns:
        The team of the current GameEnvirionment.

      • addTitle

        private void addTitle()
        Adds the power up den title label.

      • addSidePanel

        private void addSidePanel()
        Adds the side panel and all its components to the PowerUpDenPanel.

      • addContentPanel

        private void addContentPanel()
        Adds the content panel to the PowerUpDenPanel. The components of the content panel are added every time the content panel is refreshed.

      • refreshContentPanel

        private void refreshContentPanel()
        Removes all components from the content panel, and adds them again.

      • addSelectHeroPanel

        private void addSelectHeroPanel()
        Adds a panel showing each hero on the team, with a radio button allowing the user to select that hero.

      • addSelectPowerUpPanel

        private void addSelectPowerUpPanel()
        Adds a panel showing each power up and the number of that power up owned by the team. Each power up has a radio button allowing the user to select it, which is only enabled if the team owns at least one of that power up.

      • refreshApplyButton

        private void refreshApplyButton()
        Enables the Apply button if there is a hero and a power up selected, otherwise disables it.
